name: Tangerine Chronicles
description:
In this game you will help the freelancer witch Mia to find her partner, the catcorn, Tangerine! Embark on a mysterious adventure, interact with the most varied characters, collect items to complete a pentagram and solve the mystery of Tangerine's disappearance!

CONTROLS:

LMB (left mouse button) to interact with characters and items

TEAM MORPHYNAS:

QA - Amanda Góes

Composer and Audio Designer - Becca

Game Designer and QA - Bia

Producers - Camis & Dani

Programmers - Lari & Lorde

2D Artists - Marina Liz & Robs & Vanna
